title: Rarest T207 lot ever offered on BST   Sold

posts.post_title: Rarest T207 lot ever offered on BST   Sold
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McHugh
You are buying all of the following. 







SGC 10 Walter Johnson Napoleon back 1 of 2 known







SGC 10 Tris Speaker Napoleon back 1 of 2 known







SGC 40 Armondo Marsans, Amos Strunk and Jack Lively all with Napoleon backs.







SGC 60 Arthur Fletcher Napoleon back.







SGC 70 Otto Knabe Napoleon back.







3 Raw cards Hoff broadleaf back Fat Boy the widest t207 you have ever seen, Earl Moore Broadleaf back recolored and Jay Kirke Cycle back Recolored.















 And SGC A = Authentic Germany Schaefer Brown Back Recruit Lionel Carter Collection.







After collecting these for many years these are the rarest I have owned. Price sold







Scans avalible on all cards. Checks cash or money order only. Sorry not trading at this time. 







For any t207 collector this is a very very rare offering.  















Nth15@comcast.net
